#** * Message update mail template on create message * * @type mailtemplate * @translate this page requires full translation * @refactored ludovic *# Dear member of $space.displayTitle,
The following was updated in $space.displayTitle:
$udoc.displayTitle
To view the changes, click the URL below or paste it into your browser. (Remember, you must be logged in to Curriki to see this web page.)
$udoc.getExternalURL()
To change your email notification settings for $space.displayTitle, visit your group member profile on your group's Members tab at:
$xwiki.getDocument("${space.spaceName}.Members").getExternalURL()
Sincerely,
Curriki, for $space.displayTitle
